statements: SELECT * FROM athlete_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT athlete_id, class_date FROM athlete_attendance WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM athlete_attendance ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM athlete_attendance GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT DISTINCT attendance_status FROM athlete_attendance;
SELECT DISTINCT athlete_id, class_date, attendance_status FROM athlete_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY class_date DESC, athlete_id ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, class_date, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM athlete_attendance GROUP BY athlete_id, class_date HAVING total_attendance >= 1 ORDER BY athlete_id ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(class_date) AS last_class_date, MIN(class_date) AS first_class_date FROM athlete_attendance GROUP BY athlete_id ORDER BY athlete_id ASC;

SELECT athlete_id, class_date, attendance_status, CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'Present' THEN 'Attended' ELSE 'Missed' END AS attendance_type FROM athlete_attendance ORDER BY athlete_id ASC, class_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, class_date, attendance_status FROM athlete_attendance WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY class_date ASC, athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, attendance_status FROM Athletes
SELECT * FROM Classes
SELECT athlete_name, class_name FROM Athletes JOIN Classes ON Athletes.class_id = Classes.class_id
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE attendance_status = 'Present'
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM Classes ORDER BY class_date
SELECT athlete_name, class_name FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Classes ON Athletes.class_id = Classes.class_id;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM Classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, class_date FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Classes ON Athletes.class_id = Classes.class_id WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, class_duration FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Classes ON Athletes.class_id = Classes.class_id WHERE attendance_status = 'present';
SELECT athlete_id, class_name, class_date FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Classes ON Athletes.class_id = Classes.class_id WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_class FROM Athletes;
SELECT * FROM Classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM Classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, class_name, attendance_status FROM Athletes JOIN Attendance ON Athletes.athlete_id = Attendance.athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, class_name FROM Athletes JOIN Attendance ON Athletes.athlete_id = Attendance.athlete_id ORDER BY athlete_id ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_class FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_class = 'Beginner';
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM Classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, class_name, attendance_status FROM Athletes JOIN Attendance ON Athletes.athlete_id = Attendance.athlete_id JOIN Classes ON Attendance.class_id = Classes.class_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance, athlete_id FROM Attendance GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING total_attendance > 3;
SELECT * FROM athlete_classes ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_name FROM athletes WHERE athlete_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, class_id FROM classes WHERE class_id > 5 ORDER BY class_id ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, class_name FROM athletes a INNER JOIN athlete_classes ac ON a.athlete_id = ac.athlete_id INNER JOIN classes c ON ac.class_id = c.class_id WHERE ac.attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_logs WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' AND attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT athlete_name, class_name, attendance_status FROM athletes JOIN athlete_classes ON athletes.athlete_id = athlete_classes.athlete_id JOIN classes ON athlete_classes.class_id = classes.class_id;

SELECT athlete_name, COUNT(*) AS classes_attended, SUM(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'Present' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS classes_present FROM athletes JOIN athlete_classes ON athletes.athlete_id = athlete_classes.athlete_id JOIN classes ON athlete_classes.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance_logs ON athletes.athlete_id = attendance_logs.athlete_id AND athlete_classes.class_id = attendance_logs.class_id GROUP BY athlete_name;

SELECT athlete_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM athletes JOIN attendance_logs ON athletes.athlete_id = attendance_logs.athlete_id JOIN classes ON attendance_logs.class_id = classes.class_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, class_name, attendance_status FROM attendance_logs JOIN athletes ON athletes.athlete_id = attendance_logs.athlete_id JOIN classes ON attendance_logs.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE attendance_logs.attendance_status = 'Absent' ORDER BY athlete_name;

SELECT athlete_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM athletes JOIN attendance_logs ON athletes.athlete_id = attendance_logs.athlete_id JOIN classes ON attendance_logs.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE attendance_logs.attendance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, attendance_date FROM Athletes ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, class_name FROM Athletes JOIN Classes ON Athletes.class_id = Classes.class_id WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT coach_name FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT athlete_id, class_id FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE ORDER BY athlete_id ASC, class_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name FROM Athletes;
SELECT * FROM Classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, class_name FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Classes ON Athletes.class_id = Classes.class_id WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT class_name FROM Classes WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT coach_name, COUNT(class_id) AS classes_taught FROM Coaches INNER JOIN ClassCoaches ON Coaches.coach_id = ClassCoaches.coach_id GROUP BY coach_name ORDER BY classes_taught DESC;
